TITLE: Rolls-Royce sees record sales in 2022, no slowdown in spending by the wealthy
SUMMARY: Rolls-Royce sold a record number of cars in 2022 as demand for its $500,000 vehicles remained strong.

SUMMARY: While winning can make you a target for people seeking to benefit from your newfound wealth, there are ways to minimize the requests for money.

TITLE: Mark Cuban says he doesn't need his billions: I'd ‘for sure’ be just as happy with 1% of my net worth
